short_summary: Purchase one (1) Compact Disc Harrows and ancillary items for delivery to Ottawa, Ontario.
description: The Farmer will purchase one (1) Compact Disc Harrows, ancillary items, Integrated Logistic support items, including training, for delivery to Ottawa, Ontario. This is a competitive procurement. The selected supplier will provide the required goods and services at the lowest price. The Life of the contract is contingent on the terms agreed upon by both parties. The delivery is anticipated to take place at the contactor-initiated FOB. full_summary: # **Compact Disk Harrows Tender Notice** =========================================== ### **Contract Information** | **Title** | **French Title** | **Reference Number** | | --- | --- | --- | | Compact Disk Harrows | Déchaumeur à disques compacts | WS3704101116-Doc4041115269 | ### **Tender Details** * **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal * **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding * **Solicitation Number**: WS3704101116 * **Publication Date**: June 26, 2023 * **Tender Closing Date**: July 21, 2023 @ 14:00 EDT * **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) ### **Delivery and Trade Information** * **Region of Delivery**: Canada * **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) ### **End User Information** * **End User**: Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC) * **End User Address**: 960 Carling Ave, Ottawa, Ontario, K1Y 4X2, Canada ### **Attachment and Contact Information** * **Attachments**: None * **Notice URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16691911](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16691911) * **Contact Information**: Nalida Wilson-Bahun, nalida.wilson-bahun@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca ### **Tender Description** This tender is a request for proposals (RFP) to purchase one (1) compact disk harrow, ancillary items, integrated logistics support items, including training, for delivery to Ottawa, Ontario. The proposal must be submitted by July 21st, 2023 at 14:00 EDT. ... Please note: There is no need for you to include further information in the response. Only rephrase and reformat the text in a more professional manner. Do not exceed the 400-word limit. 1. Provide a Dedicated Contact for your project. 2. Be an active customer servant. 3. Understand that your customer is your boss. 4. Engage with your stakeholders during each phase of your project. 5. Mitigate risk and mitigate opportunity by always looking for ways to help the customer. In line with the governmental tender requirements,
